content.text:
# List of dams and reservoirs in the Czech Republic

This is a list of reservoirs in the Czech Republic, larger than 2 square kilometres.
{| border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;" class="sortable"
|- valign=top align=right
! bgcolor="#99CCFF" width="22%" align=left | Reservoir
! bgcolor="#99CCFF" width="44%" align=left | District
! bgcolor="#99CCFF" width="11%" | Area(km²)
! bgcolor="#99CCFF" width="11%" | Depth(m)
! bgcolor="#99CCFF" width="11%" | River
|-
| Lipno || Český Krumlov, Prachatice || 48.7 || 22 || Vltava
